channel.title: Hood News Broadcasting Network [HNBN]
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hood News Broadcasting Network - Bringing you the real to real from the news and around the world
channel.itunes:author: Politixx
channel.itunes:summary: Hood News Broadcasting Network bringing you the real to real in the news from around the world staight from the hood
channel.description: HNBN: Hood News Broadcasting Network. Bringing you the real to real on hot topics in the news and around the world. Your news brought to you hardcore with tight hip hop beats playing in the background to nod your head to. Each episode, hosted by your man Politixx, YogiSpoons and Professor L. Boogie of the HNBN will take you deeper in to world events with a view point that comes straight from the hood. Add this link to your podcasting aggregator to SMASH THE WORLD!!! http://www.switchpod.com/users/hnbn/feed.xml Visit http://www.myspace.com/hnbn and together we can smash the world yall!

item.title: HNBN 2
item.itunes:author: Politixx
item.itunes:subtitle: Hood News Broadcasting Network 2
item.itunes:summary: This week we take on immigration, Iran nukes, the Duke rape situation, Africa's destitution and more straight from the hood
item.itunes:keywords: news, hip hop, rap, commentary, politics, current events

item.title: HNBN 3 Better Late Than Never
item.itunes:author: Politixx
item.itunes:subtitle: Hood News Broadcasting Network 3
item.itunes:summary: We are late as hell with this episode but we are still going to smash the world. This week we take on the 911 trial and verdict. Immigration march results. Big oil and gas prices. Then we take on gun control in the hood.
item.itunes:keywords: news, hip hop, rap, commentary, politics, current events

item.title: HNBN The Lost Podcast
item.itunes:author: Politixx
item.itunes:subtitle: Hood News Broadcasting Network lost episode
item.itunes:summary: Our very first podcast. What was lost is now found somewhere on an external hardrive. Yeah yeah yeah HNBN Episode 1
item.itunes:keywords: news, hip hop, rap, commentary, politics, current events

item.title: Yo! We are moving
item.itunes:author: Politixx
item.itunes:subtitle: The HNBN is moving, time to switch the feed
item.itunes:summary: Yeah, yeah, yeah.... we are switching feeds. The all new revamped Hood News Broadcasting Network is now available on MySpace at myspace.com/hnbn will all new shows featuring two new hosts. Joining your man Politixx is YogiSpoons and Professor L. Boogie. Make the switch, sit back relax and enjoy the all new HNBN.
item.itunes:keywords: news, hip hop, rap, commentary, politics, current events
